# NSEvent.EventType.keyDown

**Case**

The user pressed a key on the keyboard.

## Declaration

```swift
case keyDown
```

## Getting Keyboard Event Types

- **NSEvent.EventType.keyUp**: The user released a key on the keyboard.

items.description: The user released a key on the keyboard.
